front.title: Technology Agnostic OSPF Traffic Engineering Extensions for Generalized MPLS (GMPLS)

abstract.t: This document defines a new approach to Generalized MultiprotocolLabel Switching (GMPLS) bandwidth advertisement aiming at providingthe Network Elements (NEs) and Path Computation Elements (PCEs) withall the data required for crank-backs minimization and scalabilityoptimization.A new Open Shortest Path First - Traffic Engineering (OSPF-TE)routing protocol sub-tlv is defined for bandwidth advertisement perservice type.
